resp.text: That's great to hear, Nick. We'll pass the kind words to our team. Hope to see you soon.

name: Kala Crook
text: Been in drive thru for 2 items for 20 mins now. This is the last of my money this location will ever see. They couldn't be less attentive. Service couldn't be slower. I finally get to the window and the employee is leaning out the window asking me to "blow my horn" at the previous guest, because of course, something was wrong with the order they waited 20 mins for. All the while, this woman is crushing my bag of food between her face and the window. I finally received my crushed bag to find that there's lettuce on the taco when I ordered otherwise. And,as expected, there are no napkins. So here I am trying to scrape lettuce off a taco I waited 20 mins for while driving with no napkins. Idiots. Shut this place down.

name: Jennifer Wooldridge
text: Always check ur order especially a big order they are always busy so be orepared to stay a while.  Food is always good.  Friendly staff

name: Debbie Moon
text: Food is great, as long as you get the correct food. Everytime I go to this particular one ro eat at, my order is wrong. Their customer service is very rude and want to argue with you about something your returning WITH my receipt,  just because it didn't fit me!!! That's crazy!!!! Same day I bought it, I returned it, well I tried at least...

name: Holly Machen
text: The absolute worst customer service ever. They had no drinks available. The girl up front got nasty attitude because we asked why 3 different drinks was unavailable. The sweet tea had no sugar in it, she said it wasn't her job to make it. And she was playing on her phone.

text: Good for fast food... just doesn't beat a homemade meal to me

name: Timothy Hartmann
text: Only drive thru currently

resp.text: Hey there, Timothy. Thanks for your review. We'll share your feedback with our team. We hope to see you again soon

name: Zach Hill
text:
I've given them the benefit of the doubt twice.

I ordered once, then was asked to repeat it. After reiterating, the order was called back incorrectly. I ordered again, slowly. Once I got to the window, it took a reasonable amount of time to receive food. Not the right food, but food. I pulled forward and checked the ticket. Two items were not included in my receipt. I drove back around and ordered the missing items. I pulled up to the window and was literally forgotten about. A car had come until the line behind me and ordered...them I was given their food. I hadn't paid for anything this time. I told them that was incorrect and they took the food back from my car window and HAD TO ORDER AGAIN. Then, when I FINALLY got home....MY FOOD WAS BARELY WRAPPED AND WAS DUMPED OUT OF THE SHELLS AND DIRECTLY INTO THE BOTTOM OF THE BAG. The employees here are a disgrace and it's amazing that they were even able to land a job in the first place. It's really a sad thing to see.

Same day I bought it, I returned it, well I tried at least...

name: Angela Sparks
text: I've been there twice now since it reopened. The tacos are super greasy. So greasy, in fact, that the grease leaked through the bag. The nachos hardly had meat or cheese but had clumps of dried beans. Nasty. I'm not much of a fast food person. I certainly won't be going back here.

text: Omg if I could put no stars then I would just went through the drive thru got 10 dollar items and one car in front of me and not but 2 cars for the inside and got up to the window and paid sit there 12 minutes waiting on the food seen the manager at the lobby register just standing there she turns around sees me ask about my order to the crew and she picks it up right by the drive thru register it had been sitting there awful service

I AM A HISPANIC MAN! And this has been the worst taco bell ever !

text: I went for the ranchero fries they didnt have any more so I loaded up on m ok mini beef and chicken QUESADILLA WIT DIABLO SAUCE.

name: s m
text: The first time I went to tacobell/kfc, their extra crispy chicken tenders was so burnt/over cooked my dog wouldn't even eat it. But everything else was good. I decided to try it again yesterday and the tenders was small but this time they wasnt burnt/overcooked. Also they was out of the Nashville hot. I was very disappointed. They was out of other stuff too from what I was hearing from other people ordering and talking about while waiting on their food. I was also disappointed that the lady had to come over 2 times to hand us stuff they forgot to put with our food before bringing it to us but am grateful that we did get all the food and didnt have to make another trip to get it. Also noticed that the mini chicken sandwiches that I got wasn't done right. All in all I might try them again down the rd but dont think it will be any time soon. Poor management, ok service,

name: ThisIsATest
text: This place couldn't get an order right if their life depended on it. Yet I keep going back, because I love Taco Bell. I feel bad for the manger here because he has to remake all those orders. If he would just check the bags and orders for a couple of days, the workers would try harder. And his food cost would go down. SMH.....I think I'm done with this Taco Bell.

name: dusty carroll
text: I went around 3pm, I ordered a triple layer nacho and a Frito burrito, and it wasn't good. The nachos were soggy and the burrito was hard on the ends and dry like it had been sitting under a heat lamp for hours. This isn't the first time I've had a bad experience with this taco Bell/KFC. In fact, I swore I want going to eat there again, but thought I might give it another chance today, I was wrong, it sucked!

text: They got good food & prices but can be a little slow or under staff at times.

text: I went for the ranchero fries they didnt have any more so I loaded up on m ok mini beef and chicken QUESADILLA WIT DIABLO SAUCE.

text: This one I visited...was NOT GOOD! Drive thru gave me all bean burrito, when I ordered and paid for supreme. Line was too long to go back.

name: Jill King
text: Service wasn't great!  We had to wait awhile to even place our order.

name: Mizzuz Mo
text: I always have a good experience here. Order it's always fast and perfect!

name: Michael Ford
text: Paige the manager was the worst and most rudest manager I've ever encountered. I was justified in calling their store and letting them k ow they forgot my popcorn chicken and potato wedges and she clearly called me out and said I was lying and that every manager in the store had checked my order before it was handed to me in the drive thru. She also claimed that she distinctively remembered putting my popcorn chicken and Cole slaw in my bag when I came inside... Problem is, I never came inside. And I didn't order coleslaw and coleslaw wasn't even on my ticket.  She had obviously mistaken me for someone else but hung up in my face while I was still talking.  I will never ever eat at this place ever again for as long as I live.  Taco Bell... I ain't finished here yet... By the time I'm done telling everyone about my rotten service here, I am certain I will have done some damage to your stores business.  Just look at the other ratings and problems other people have reported with your store.  And you can thank your manager Paige for what I'm about to do.  You've already lost your first customer who usually ate there 2 to 3 times a week.  So you can go ahead and count that as 1.

name: S Wyatt
text: Fast, fun, cheap for a rare night when to tired to cook.

name: Loghan Moore
text: Man in front of me had his order taken, the register employee then proceeded to walk away and talk with 2 other employees for 10 minutes while one of them cooked the man's food. 3 more people came in line, and someone finally came out to take my order, after the man before me had eaten half of his food. Not terrible food. Very average. Attalla Taco Bell seems to be the safest bet in the area. 2/5

text: Sloppy making their buritos... all this or that in one place... no cheese then all of a sudden way too much... Ya'll can be a little more careful.

name: D G (Djgriff69420)
text: First and last time going to this taco bell location. I should have noticed the signs of" don't waste time or money here" when I pulled in to the drive through line I immediately heard a customer as he walked out saying F#$@ this taco bell then he sped of angrily. There were 5 cars in line ahead of me three had already ordered and it took me a total of 15 minutes b4 I got to order and another 15 b4 I got my food. If that wasn't bad enough when I do stop to eat my food every item I had ordered was shittily slopped upon the tortillas my spicy tostada had literally almost 3/4 of a lb. Of beans in one lump like mashed potatoes and gravy with a dent in the center and the rest of the ingredients filling the crater like gravy.. Worst location, staff and lunch ever. I fed the garb to some stray dogs 2 turned it down and the 3rd vomited after a few bites. Thanks taco bell I thought I was supposed to get a kiss if I bought lunch instead I just got F^#@<#..

text: Great service, clean and employee's are very friendly

name: Traci Jordan

name: Ran Parish

name: Seymour Butts
text: It's been redone.bigger booths and more seating.but the drink station is too small.causes lines when lunch rush going on.

name: Charlie
text: The dining area always smells like raw sewage and the last time I ate here they told me they didn't want to make what I had ordered and asked me to order something else. I wouldn't recommend eating here unless you absolutely have to. I would give zero stars if that was an option.

name: adam harmless
text: The employees are almost always friendly and helpful. Even when there's the occasional order mistake (which is not surprising because of the large and varied menu), they fix it quickly and professionally.

name: Malek Omri
text: Bad staff. Always angry with international customers.

name: Easy E
text: Worst KFC ever. Went bye after a long day of fishing and ordered a 8pc Extra crispy. Chicken was super dry as if it had been sitting up for hours after the hold time expired. Then I only received 6pcs. This is the 2nd time I've ever visited this location and each time I received horrible service. That tells me that the store manager is not doing there job. Train your employees BETTER.

name: Danielle Cash
text: Really long wait

resp.text: We never want to make you wait, Danielle. We'll pass this along to the appropriate team to look into. We appreciate your feedback.

name: Brandon Barnes
text: Affordable, delicious, and it will satisfy any craving.

name: Stacy Gary
text: Great $5 dollar boxes!

name: Rebecca
text: Great!!! Best customer service of any I have visited.

name: TG R.
text:
Went there for a  Nacho Bell Grande. It was just okay nothing spectacular in regard to the food to report.
An employee there did help me out in terms of customer service. She came from behind the counter to help me with condiments. With my limited Mobility that helped me out a great deal and I was very appreciative. I wish I had got her name so I can let her employer know how grateful I am for her assistance. It's the little things that can mean so much. I just know she's a fan of a good old country music.

name: jessica thompson
text: Took 30 min to get food. Was the only ones there. Lady kicking her fingers and drinking while in the kitchen. Didnt wash her hands. Then they didnt pack our sides. So we got home and most of our food wasn't in there!!! Never go back!!

name: Allison Kenney
text: I dont like leaving negative reviews, however this is not the only time I've had a horrible experience here. It's one thing to mess up a meal, but when you completely forget the main part of a combo, and mess up the other half, I get a very irritated. Especially when I have to go all the way back to get my order corrected and the girl up front could tell I was irritated, but when she has to ask if the food was done yet, and the girl who was making it gets sassy and tells back that shes making it makes it worse. Cause all I wanted was to go home and eat a quick meal with my fiance  and when I finally get back my food was cold, so I decided I just wasnt going to eat. Like I said I hate leaving negative reviews, but this isn't the first time something like this has happened at this Taco Bell!

name: Jennifer Wooldridge
text: Always check ur order especially a big order they are always busy so be orepared to stay a while.  Food is always good.  Friendly staff

text: usually a good quick place to go but at times you may have to wait so be prepared to wait

text: Sitting in drive thru at 1:22am (hours online say closes at 2am) and waited 10 mins before calling. Timmy said they were closed. Drove around and sign showed no closing time. Sign in the window shows 'Drive Thru Open'. Need to update hours if you're closing before posted times.

text: It was alright

text: Pretty good but sometimes it can go wrong. Orders can be wrong and sometimes the store will open late and close early.

text: If you get your order and its done right .. its good ..but 7 or 8 times out of 10 you wont have what you ordered , you'll be missing a couple things or it will be made wrong.. but they usually give out a free taco coupon or some cookies for your troubles .. text: Waited nearly 10 minutes at the drive thru window for a Cheesy Gordita Crunch and a chicken Quesarito. After we drove off, i discovered that they gave me a Quesadilla instead. So we went inside and waited nearly another 10 minutes for a single burrito to be made. Customer service was severely lacking. The dude didn't ask if we need any sause, he just threw some mild in the bag and expected it to be good. When we asked for a different sause he handed us waaaay to many, and seemed irritated that i even asked. I understand fast food is awful to work, but there's still like a low level of expectations to be met and they were not met in any fashion during my visit. My remade burrito wasn't even wrapped properly, and was falling apart. Overall, a very disappointing visit. I'd swerve for a other tacobell in the area or something.

Y’all UPCHARGED me for the steak, when it was all y’all had. Went last night, spent $18 on a small  drink, large drink, 4 meximelts, 2 cheese rollups, & 4 pack of cinnabons. Y’all were slow, & out of the cinnabons. She asked if i wanted twists or an empanada instead.. which is cheaper. She told me to have a good night & was about to let me drive off having paid extra! I told the cashier that they should make a sign for the door stating to use other door and she just laughed. It was nasty so much so our shoes were sticking to the floor. text: I'm very picky about breakfast burritos, and most places get them too greasy and falling apart. But the burrito I had here they toast it like a panini so it doesn't fall apart and it was the best tasting burrito! Sausage, cheese, egg, onions, peppers. I asked for extra cheese and a cup of salsa. Best breakfast I've had in awhile. And it was more than enough, I was worried about not having a side but I couldn't even finish my burrito.

resp.text: We are so glad you enjoyed it! Come see us again soon!

text: I was so excited to finally be able to stop at the Station Cafe but now I  wish I had never made that stop. I ordered a large hot latte but what I got I have no idea. It was the worst latte I'd ever had. At first I thought it was just weak coffee and the guy just forgot what I ordered but I'm  not sure if it was even that. It was frothy so he got the milk part right I just don't know about the rest of it.  I did think at the time he made it awfully quick and I commented on that to him after all a 2 shot espresso latte takes a few minutes to make. I guess he must of just left out my 2 shots. Waste of $4.  I would have return to cafe but I  was almost home before I tried the drnk and I don't live in Arab.

resp.text: I’m so sorry that you didn’t enjoy your coffee! The gentleman that made your coffee today has many years of experience as a barista and since our opening in May, we’ve  had nothing but positive feedback on anything he’s made. Next time you are in town, we’ll be happy to refund your coffee or make you another one on the house! Again, I’m terribly sorry you didn’t enjoy your experience and we’d love the opportunity to try again!

name: Cam Mackenzie
text: Terrible. Ordered appetizers that never came, but were delivered as sides instead. The order took forever to actually come out, and two people were missing orders. Drinks were never refilled, and at some point, we resulted to refilling our own, all while some five servers watched us do it. And still didn't refill our waters later until we asked. The food tasted bad. So bad. The chicken was cold and tasted not much unlike what I would imagine to be sweaty playground rubber chips. We normally go to the one in Jones Valley, which is great, but this one was far from it. I'm trying to put it into words, but all I can do is say it's the restaurant equivalent of a very warm and a very soggy salad. We were charged for food we didn't order. Meanwhile, the stool had maybe three tables of people and that's it. All the while, the wait staff stood at the front and talked.

name: S Lee
text: We traveled over an hour to shop in Huntsville only to end up waiting for food we never received for an hour. Out of all the food options in Huntsville we chose BWW and for that we blame ourself. NEVER again. This restaurant is representative of the deserted mall it is housed in. There were tons of servers doing nothing but waiting on the next patron to dart the door and none ever noticed we were not being served. We were two tables away from the host desk and the restaurant was not busy. After the extensive wait and seeing the cooks(I assume) look out the kitchen window, we hit the door. So frustrated we did not even shop. I guess everyone needs to experience the worst service ever and for us this was it! Unbelievable! How are they still in business?

name: ray ray whitty
text: Oh man. What a **Itty place. HORRIBLE SERVICE! I am not a complainer,  but this place had me pissed off. I watched 3 different tables of people leave before they even got their drinks. 30 mins later we get our drinks, and 45 minutes after that we get our room temp wings, with hardly any sauce on them. The waitresses looked greasy and disgusting. The manager was incompetent and full of excuses. I WILL NEVER GO BACK. EVER.

name: Travis Specht
text: Ignored the othr reviews, bad idea.  Ordered by phone, get there and the order is wrong (surprise considering the girl on the phone was super short and hungup right away when I was done ordering without repeating).  Waited an extra 10 minutes to get it fixed. I get home and they didn't include any of the sauces that were supposed to come with my sampler ap and there was no sauce on my sandwich.  Not like there was very little sauce, there was almost no sacue at all (the bun was even clean and dry).  Called back and the girl said she was back there when they made the sandwich and there was sauce on it but it must have come off while it was under the heat lamp.  She offered to put me down for a food credit but I'm not from huntsville so that's useless and even if I were why would I want credit for more crappy quality food? There were some solid employees (the femal assistant manager was really nice) but the bad quality control and the lazy employees make this the worst bww I've been to.  Waste of $30.

text: This is a franchise..so wings on Tuesday are more expensive than the company owned chain... $0.75 (is that a deal?). Asked for Tito's or Absolute and they did not have either (basic vodka?..took wings over 30 minutes to come out and asked for a beer at 11:30 when they close at 12..and they said the bar was shut off. 2 stars is being kind...this is the worst!!!!

Today I called at 7:40 to place an order for pick up and no answer.... so I called again... and again... no answer. I finally arrived and the lights were on and the girls had ignored my calls and had already shut everything down and were just sitting there. If your business is open until 8, then it needs to stay open until 8!

text: I mean, it's fine. It's Subway. There's not a whole lot else to say about it. One guy at this location knows how to roll a wrap correctly, and the other one is clueless. But, always good service, and... It's fine, it's Subway.

The order and  payment was accepted by the store (the deal was reflected on my receipt). When I went to pick up the order they told me we are not participating in the offer. They had my cell phone on order but didn't have the courtesy to call and at least tell that this order cannot be processed when they saw the order. They did give me money back by Cash. When I called Customer Service to talk about this issue, they confirmed this store HAS CHOSEN to participate in the offer but denied.

name: Mandy Nall
text: I've been a loyal patron of Country's BBQ since they opened their door for business on Zelda Road. It's truly the BEST BBQ locally.  Everything on the menu is homemade.  They offer everything from the best variety picks of vegetables (sweet potato is the bomb and HUGE, fried okra, corn on the cob, great fried green tomatoes are so yummy, field peas, mashed potatoes, cabbage… all recommended). The Q stew, i.e.:Brunswick stew is a winner. ALL PORK AND BEEF platters, inside or outside chopped, served with 1 or 2 sides,  French bread or cornbread will fill you up with a to-go box for sure. The ribs fall off the bone,  and I truly recommend the chef salad.  All dressings are homemade. Price per person is about $10-14 for a full meal. Homemade lemonade and sweet tea are outstanding. Don't forget dessert.  The pecan pie and lemon pie are the best around. If you've got the time to wait, their steaks are excellent too. Chopped steak is my favorite, the fried chicken fingers are so crisp and tender. My kids love them. They cater too, and do a very good job. Try a nearby Country's,  you won't be disappointed,  I promise.

name: Jeremy English
text: Had the special, pulled pork plate. It was honestly great, sauce was pleasing and not too sweet. The sweet tea was outstanding, service was good, it wasn't crowded at all when I went. A little pricey at $13+, though.

name: Linda H
text: I am very impressed with the owner of this establishment. If for some reason you have any problem, he will immediately take care of it for you. I suppose any of us can have a less than favorable experience, anywhere, at any time. I know first hand that Mr. Powell appears to care that his customers have a favorable experience!

resp.text: Dear Linda H, I greatly apologize for your experience this weekend with Country's Barbecue. That is not how I want our customers to be dining on a holiday! Please call me at the corporate office so I can make it up to you. Sincerely, Mark Powell 271-2017

name: Cynthia P
text: Can't wrong with Country's BBQ.  I've never ordered anything I didn't enjoy.  They have a great club Sammy, a great (big) salad, great chopped pork, delicious sides and so much more!!  If you don't give them a try, you will be missing out on a great meal.

name: UnicornPoo OnU
text: This is the second time me and my girlfriend have eaten here. The first time it was ok but nothing to write home about and tonight made the first time seem like a great experience. She got the pulled pork sandwich and fries. The pork was tough and cold and the fries were cold and covered in grease. I got the Larry's Special which is supposed to be tenderloin marinated in special sauce, and fries. The meat came out just slightly warm and the fries were cold and covered in grease. When they refer to their special sauce, what the menu should say is that the meat has been swimming in Dale's Sauce for about a week and is almost too salty to eat. The waiter asked how the food was, which was obviously a formality because when I told him he acted as if I'd said the food was great and walked away. That's the last $30 this place will ever get out of me.

resp.text: Hi Jonathan, I am sorry you were less than happy with your recent experience at our Zelda Rd. location. Everyone can have a bad day and maybe you caught us on one of ours. Please call me at the corporate office (271-2017) so I can make it up to you. I hope you'll give us another try. Sincerely, Mark Powell - Owner

name: Brian Wilson
text: Loved our experience at Country's BBQ on Zelda Road in Montgomery!  Highly recommend to anyone for some of the best BBQ in the River Region.  Wife and I thoroughly enjoyed the food and the sauces were to DIE FOR!

name: K&A GrassBusters
text: Ordered to go at Zelda Rd. I give a 2 star only because the stew and the tea was good.  My fiance order was messed up she ordered Okra and got fries cold fries at that also we didn't get the bread with our order. We changed from the Atlanta Hwy location to Zelda Rd because ATL Hwy messed our order up big time with my whole family it took us months to eat at Country's again probably will just cook my own from now on seeing the one place that had it together when I was growing surely doesn't have it any more

name: Jessie Godfrey
text: The food was fantastic and the service was spot on! Had the chef salad with homemade ranch with pulled pork with bacon! Yes, it was as amazing as it sounds!

name: Kaleigh Flatt
text: Great place for lunch.  I always get the vegetable plate or the brunswick stew.  And of course a giant sweet tea!

name: Tech Man
text: 2 or 3 times a year I drive from Atlanta to Mobile and back, this is my halfway point. I do not miss stopping in for lunch in both directions! Always great food and smiles!

name: Jacob Sterrett
text: Absolutely delicious, we had the barbeque platters with two of the sides from the infinite selection. Meat was great, they had wonderful sauces as well. Would reccomend 5/5!

name: Pamala Howell-Paoli
text: We were travelling through and looked on our phone to see what BBQ places were here. To my enthusiasm n surprise, Country's BBQ. I grew up in Columbus, Ga and go back from time to time. And EVERY TIME I do go back 1st place I stop is Country's. I LOVE Columbus Country BBQ and longed for it. About 3pm when we first walked in, the Mgr told us "to walk over there, grab a menu and seat where ever we wanted". There was 2 other couples in dining area. The waitress was outstanding!! I don't remember her name, but she was super bubblely. But we were so disappointed with the food. I ordered my usual; pulled pork platter. Husband ordered his usual; 1/2 chicken. Well the pork was drowned in chutney n coleslaw juices, which totally ruined the taste mainly b/c I don't like chutney. I used a numerous amount of napkins to dry up the juice. Husband's chicken looked liked it was cooked the day before or real early that morning. The BBQ sauce was dried and skin was wrinkled up and some spots were burnt. It was very dry. Husband informed waitress and she was very helpful and offered another one, fresher or something else. He ordered another chicken. The 2nd chicken was a more moist but didn't compare to the taste of Country's in Columbus. If Jim is affiliated with this establishment, he would be ashamed. Also, the Mgr had fixed a plate for herself and sat and ate. Not once did she come over to ask about why we sent it back.  How convenient it would've been since we travel through Montgomery often and it's closer than Columbus for us. Needless to say, we won't be coming back or if by some chance we do, we will hope to remember and not order the same thing.......

resp.text:
Dear Pamala,

I am so sorry to hear about your recent experience at our Zelda Road location. I am glad your waitress was wonderful, but I am disappointed to hear about your food experience. Thank you for bringing these issues to my attention so I can address them immediately. I would like to make it up to you! Please give me a call at the corporate office... 334-271-2017

Sincerely,
Mark Powell, Owner

name: Jim Davis
text: My wife and I have been stopping at Country's for over 25 years when traveling between Atlanta and Pensacola FL. The BBQ is excellent, sweet potatoes are hugh, the backfire slaw is tangy, and the fried green tomatoes are outstanding. We love this restaurant.

name: MARJORIE BAKER
text: Excellent, excellent barbecue, great brunswick stew, top notch chef salad and good southern sweet tea.  Would just ask them to work on appearance of restaurant, particularly the drive thru area.  Needs a bit of cleaning at the window, outside and inside.

name: Robert Smith
text: This was the first time we have eaten at (take out) Country's BBQ (night of 23 Feb 2015).  I am not sure if the staff was just busy at time of order or what.  While calling in the order the person taking the order seemed inpatient. We picked up the order 10 minutes later and noticed there was only one person dining in Country's BBQ, 4 staff in the kitchen and one or two staff in the dining area. About 4 orders were picked up while we waited 10 more minutes (added item to order) for our order. After getting home I realized my 1/2 and 1/2 order of fried pickles and onions was far from being fried.  In fact it was very clear they had gone straight from the container to my take out container. Not cooked what-so-ever. I was soo disappointed. Was really looking forward to trying the side dishes. Now I travel a lot and have been to great BBQ places across the US and outside the US and this is definetly not one of them. Anyone who says Country's BBQ is great has not had good BBQ. Aside from the poorly prepared side dishes the BBQ (chicken and beef) was just okay, definetly not worth mentioning. Being that the food was just okay at best there was no reason to call and complain as we would have only gotten more phone attitude.  Would not recommend this place.

resp.text:
Dear Robert,
Please allow us to apologize. We get a lot of good comments about our marinated barbecue onions. We have garnished our plates with these for 33 years. We only started frying these a short while ago. I have found the ticket for that evening and it is obvious that we filled the order with or regular marinated onions not fried… The order the chef got reflected barbecue onions and pickles, not fried or half-n-half. A simple miscommunication.  Please feel free to call the corporate office anytime you are not satisfied. 334-271-2017. I would be glad to forward you a replacement coupon or a refund. Thank you for taking the time to advise us.  Your business is sincerely appreciated.
Sincerely,
Mark Powell, Owner

They always run out of Baja Blast at this store consistently so good luck if that is the reason you are stopping by this place. text: This location sells stale cinnamon twists. They also disrespect customers by refusing to hand them their change when you ask for a refund for the stale cinnamon twist. Instead, they tell you that they only cook them in the morning and lay your change on the counter. As a general manager of a restaurant I know how disrespectful it is when a customer sets their change down on the counter and I also know that the manager did so on purpose just to be disrespectful. I honestly cannot believe that this company would employ such a rude person, and then promote that person to a manager.

I'm like why have to lie about the tacos and why I have to bring all the food up to the counter. Sure enough I rolled up at 2:56am and the shop was closed down. All signs and lights off, no cars in the parking lot. I might add that my order included nacho fries, which I since learned were discontinued despite the cashier taking my order with no complaint. 1/5

text: Yum!! Taco Bell is one of my favorite places. This location in Hoover ALWAYS gets my orders correct and the employees have excellent customer service.

name: Pasky Pasky
text:
NEVER skip checking your bag(s) after going through the drive through at this location. Your order is guaranteed to be wrong 9 times out of 10, and they will neglect to give you some of the items you paid for. To top that off, the items you managed to receive will likely not be made properly. I can't tell you how many times my grilled chicken quesadilla was steak or shredded chicken (yuck) instead. I've also ordered extra cheese or meat on multiple occasions in the past, only to be given *less* than the normal amount.

To make matters worse, the staff is very slow and extremely rude. They never apologize when they mess up orders; it's pretty obvious they don't care due to their passive attitudes.

Management: Please make sure your employees know that it is not appropriate to not give the customer what they paid for. It's making this location look very bad, especially considering how amazing the Alabaster location is. I don't think I'll bother here anymore.

text: Worst fast food restaurant I have ever been to. I will never go back to this location again. I should have walked out when I smelled the restaurant. The people who ordered before me had time to eat and leave and be gone for 5 min before I got my food. The entire wait for my food there were 2 toddlers running around the dine in area screaming. It appeared that the cashier was babysitting this toddlers. She kept leaving the register to tend to them and give them drinks. That was very unacceptable. I ordered this for dine in but after being in the restaurant for 20 min I was tired of hearing 2 kids screaming and running around I asked them to give me the food to go. I get back to work to eat and the quesadilla was not properly cooked and just fell apart. I will never go back. And as an engineer I hope fast food workers are replaced with efficient equipment. And they think they deserve 15 an hour. Yea right.

name: Morasha Bouie
text:
(Translated by Google) The cue 😋😋😋

(Original)
El taco 😋😋😋

name: Chynna Chambliss
text: Worst experience ever. My boyfriend ordered through the mobile app and when I got there the lady said they had not received an order. I had a screenshot of the order and showed her after she rudely said he must have put the order in at another location. She snatched my phone and called her manager and was discussing then asked for a screenshot of the payment status when it was on the first picture but anyways after showing the payment status, she slides my phone across the counter and does not say anything to me if she or isn't going to make it. The gas station clerk asked me if they were going to get me straight and I said well I hope so. Then the subway lady doesn't acknowledge me and says to the gas station lady, so the order was lost and she (me) is going to have get refunded so it's like she (me) is getting the sandwiches for free. I didn't care for a refund, after 15 minutes I just wanted my food. When she finished making the sandwiches, she put them in the bag and slid the bag across the counter and I was trying to be nice because maybe she had a bad day or her manager wasn't so nice on the phone and said hope that wasn't an hassle. She walks off and says it happens. I did not appreciate the service she gave. Next time, I'll go to jersey mike's.

name: Destinee Ballard
text: Love this subway  gives alot of  Vegetables

name: Jenny Seals
text: The woman that served my sub was so rude I will never eat subway again.. subway was my favorite until I just came out of there. She even charged me 3$ for meat!! Pour salt over everything alot if it!! At first she put 1 piece of turkey on my sandwich then I asked for another piece for $3

name: Jackie Benson
text: The staff has always been helpful and friendly and do their job well.  Subway has great sandwiches.

name: Ruby Graham
text: 2/19/2020 After spending a few hours at the ER with my husband we were a bit hungry just to walk in and find it was closed 20 minutes early. Everything was completely shut down which led  me to believe that it was closed even earlier than  the 20 minutes and the employee gave us such a dirty look as she talked with the employee of the station side of the store. It was definitely one of those "Just Wow" moments.

name: Kristen Eubanks
text: I worked at subway 7 years you can't tell me that if you don't get your sandwich toasted that there's no way to heat the meat. If I'm spending 10 bucks on a sandwich and I have to turn around and re make my food there's no reason to waste my money at this dump

name: April Stormes
text: First of all I would like to sincerely apologize for unpleasant past experience some of you have had at our Subway location. We have a total new staff, including management, and are working hard to improve our store and rebuild our business. I would like to invite our community to revisit our Subway for delicious sandwiches and salads served with great service and smiling faces! We are also now proudly accepting EBT at our location.

name: *Chevy Meg*
text: TERRIBLE!!!! Don’t even try going in 5 min before they close because they will turn you away in a heartbeat!!! They have had terrible service for years and something needs to be done!!! This is ridiculous!!!

name: Ragan Self
text: Rude workers and they gave me someone else's order that they mixed up with mine! I'm giving them one star because it won't let me leave a ZERO!!!!

name: jay goodson
text: Asked for double meat on my 6inch .gave me 2 pieces charged me $3 lol literaly slapped it on ,.this was me giving them a 2nd chance from previous visit

name: Umayr Kaleem
text: Not 24 hours

name: wendy thomas
text:
I have never had a bad experience at this location.
Food is always fresh and hot, and the staff is super friendly.
Keep up the Great work !!

name: Eryck Lycan
text: I’m from Texas and have been to several Waffle House locations but this location has been my best experience. Quick service and super friendly staff.

name: Steve Patterson
text: This waffle House would have ranked the five except we were so cold we couldn't eat our food we had to go out to the car and get a blanket. The food here was cooked perfectly! Even though it got cold before we can eat it.

name: Shawna Smith
text: Fast and affordable. They have an awesome cheese steak.

name: brenda f
text: Wow. Christmas day - it was busier & louder than I've ever seen it. There was a line at the door so my friend from high school & I opted for the counter.  JoJo barking out the orders with his loud & deep voice, the cooks fast-paced cooking, the waitresses taking turns waiting of people & washing dishes, and the gals cleaning tables.   They were really doing their stiff with a smile. All except that one guy - not management - who always seems to be walking around and not doing anything.  With all that going on, our food was hot, fresh, and tasty.

name: Donna Jean Snyder
text: Great food and good prices.  Needs sugar-free syrup.

name: Tammie Alford
text: Great food, friendly staff. Great service all around. Will definitely be a returning customer.

name: Detra Fondren
text: The service was exceptional but the restaurant itself was poorly maintained it was very dirty on their defense they were very shorthanded the food was excellent friendly service just the cleaning this needs to be addressed a little bit but I think that's due to them being short-handed so I gave them at 3 if it have been a little cleaner they would have definitely got a five stars

name: Ashley Kindt
text: One of the best Waffle Houses I've been to. Very fast and clean

name: Teresa Ray
text: April was our waitress and she kept the coffee cup filled and was very nice. The lady that was the prepared our meal exactly 💯. We will be back.

name: Eugene Hansen
text: Up to our expectations (wife likes cinnamon toast and grits) I like to make her day

name: Pat Hamilton McMurrey
text:
The food could have been better. The eggs were browned and not stirred/scrambled  good before cooking and the grits were barely warm. The service was very good.
Jun 10, 2021
The staff are great, the food is ok, but the dining room is ice cold!! My food gets cold before I can even eat it!!! Who wants cold eggs and hash browns?? This is a problem in almost ALL Waffle House restaurants.

name: Bill Eidson
text: Classic American diner. Those folks work hard and offer great service.

name: Wanda Munguia
text: Would of have 5 stars if it wasn’t for our waitress Jess. She was very rude. Snatched silverware out of hand, didn’t check up on us after food was delivered, we had to flag her down just to get a coffee refill. Hair was all down in her face, and mask wasn’t worn right while she was inches from my face talking.  I’m a firm believer in tips but I tip based on service. No tip. Very unprofessional. If you hate your job just say that.

name: Amy Sims
text: It's sad when waffle House cannot take a to-go order over the phone they tell you to come down there and place your order on a recording.if I wanted to go down there and place my order I would eat in I want to call my order and go pick it up and go to my house and eat it so that's why you're getting a bad review.that's why you have no customers and when you close up and you don't have a job you'll learn to pick up that phone. So I'm taking my business to the next place that does calling orders for tonight so you lost my business for today

name: Shane Pritchett
text: There food is great and always kept a ck to see if u needed anything else

name: Lindsey Fincher
text: Awesome food. Quick ticket time. Awrse staff

name: Shai White
text: This is, hands down, the best waffle house. Ever. The food is always great, and the people are always friendly. If I eat at another waffle house,  I always find myself comparing everything to this one. By far the best. By far.

name: Bruce Sandlin
text: Just passing thru, this location had excellent service, food was cooked perfect. Recommend.

name: A “Mama D” D
text: The food had an unusual old greasy smell & taste,we had to use to-go containers because they wouldn't let us eat inside and we thought maybe because they didn't want to wash dishes.There was four of us who order and it was so greasy with a peculiar smell could hardly eat any of it & ended up throwing into the dogs

name: Teresa Pelt
text: Great  experience.  Food was excellent

name: Ann Turner
text: Excellent service everytime. My Dad and I visit every Saturday for breakfast.

name: george webb
text: great food great staff restaurant was clean

name: Lucenda Sanders
text:
Only one server is handling to go orders and handling in house orders on purpose. Doesnt wash her hands. Is rude to her staff trying to help. You need to have curbside pick up at this location. The servers name is lisa.
If your togo person gives a specific time it should be a team effort to get orders out.  Vs having 4 people looking at their to go orders while the same server gives other people their food. Social distancing and masks are no respected. Sign for mandatory masks are not up so you are risking the life of your workers.

Yours truly,
Purple haired Karen

name: Keith Hunter
text: Good waffles. My wife took some of mine.

name: Girli Green
text: In general Waffle House almost never disappoints. They can also be counted on to have clean restrooms when on the road.

name: Glenn Rayburn
text: Great food and great service.

name: Kevin Perry
text: People are friendly. Food is good. Sweet tea was alittle watered down but other good experience.

name: Thomas Fletcher
text: Great service, food, speed, speed, and overall clean facility.

name: Clifford Prussia
text: Good food and service.

name: Rob Cowart
text: Fast, efficient and tasty.

name: Daniel Haynes
text: Food came out very fast with quality and good service👍

name: Ricky Hogan
text: Great service good food

name: Theresa Jenkins
text: Call the order in and spoke with the lady in the pink shirt! Told her the order, waited in our car. Then called back and spoke to the lady and told her my order. Then went into the store and repeated the order to her face she still got it wrong and after we paid $26 dollars. We got home and still it was wrong! The managers were nice and I was not looking for a refund I wanted my food and great quality. Very disappointed!

resp.text: We definitely want to address this with our team, can you please give us more info via this link: http://bit.ly/1MtpDDS

name: john bolter
text: Kinda busy but food came quick.  But smaller portions than most other Waffle House's

name: Derwin Johnson
text: Was not thrilled about there well done steak it looked like it was boiled and chilli was to watery but i would try something else to recommend.

name: Derwin Johnson

name: Jennifer Jones

name: rebecca bishop
text: Except it was freeeeezing!

name: Maya Wiseman
text: GREAT WAFFLE HOUSE!!! I am traveling, from Birmingham to Atlanta, during the day on a Sunday & the staff was so great! They got my order my correct then when I eat at my home Waffle House. Quick, attentive, patience & kind. Hope I will have great service here again!

name: Bryan Abercrombie
text: Old Reliable a consistent meal no matter where you go

name: Andy Hawkins

name: Cory Bullard

name: Anthony Manning
text: The food was exactly as I expected and it came out in a timely manner. The waitress was professional and helpful.

resp.text: Thanks for visiting and hope to see you again soon!

name: Heath Petty
text: The food at this location is always edible, just sometimes “hit and miss” with flavor.  But there is one thing that you can ALWAYS count on being consistent... And that is the rude, inconsiderate service that you get from the moment you walk in, until the time you leave.

name: Crystal Merchant
text: Good Hamburger.

name: Amanda Sparks
text: Bad experience. We sat at our table for about 20 minutes before the grill cook came over to take our order because our server wouldn't. Exceptional service by Michael, the grill cook. Awful service by pretty much everyone else. One woman kept having an attitude with every customer that came in the door. Only reason it is not a single star is because of Michael.

name: ShelAye Wiz
text: Good but afterwards got sick from all the grease.

name: Oz Me
text: I don't know how this compares to other waffle houses but it was hardy food and tasted great. PS. They were social distancing.!

name: Shawn McNaron

name: Cindy Morton

name: megaphone

name: Marjorie Dobbs

name: Fabiana deSouza
text: We had a great experience at Waffle House today! Everybody was fabulous! I ordered something and when got it, it didn't look like what I see in the picture. The server noticed that first thing and fixed the right one right away. They were always checking on us, asking if I needed more coffee, and also offered me water. They were fabulous. Thank you so very much for everything! God bless you all!

name: Jennifer Ferdin
text: Clean, fast hot food comes out with a smile. Coffee always refilled and servers are all so nice. Will be back again!!!

name: Mary Taylor

The waitress was wonderful even took it back and got another one also made sure we were taken care of. They really need to clean the grill second time was a little better still has so few black burnt pieces

name: Jeff Herndon

name: Rodney Simpkins

The staff was friendly, helpful,& smiling !!!!
The service was awesome !!!!!!
The food was perfection !!!!!!
If, I get the chance to eat there ( at exit # 158, off I-20 ) again, I sure will  !!!!!!!!!

name: Jennifer French

This was one of the best places to eat at in Pell city maybe it will be again. Would not let me order my regular which was a t-bone so I ordered egg an cheese with bacon and raisin toast which my order had no cheese,  no bacon,  and no raisin toast.

name: Johnny Laird

name: Billy Ritch
text: Instead of breakfast i chose the dbl paddymelt with onions and hashbrowns with cheese. Hashbrowns were great as usual, but the paddymelt was dry due to beef patties being so overcooked. My wife had ham, egg and cheese on toast, eggs cooked well and hashbrowns in the ring. Hashbrowns were great, but her sandwich was very dry as well. We eat at waffle house (leeds, al) approx 5 times a week and will continue to do so, but grill master at this location (pell city) needs to work on making juicier sandwiches. Waiter did a great job, no issues there at all.

name: Nicole Harrelson
text: Fast service and friendly waitress

name: Sandy Moses
text: Good

name: John Bryan
text: Waffle house is the best place to stop when traveling. The food is always good.

name: Darlene Willis

name: Deborah Armstrong
text: All the food is really good. The grits were awesome. Very nice waitresses.

name: Rebecca Weaver
text:
Quite possibly the best Waffle House we've ever encountered with friendly employees, clean tables, good food.
Thanks to Jenny for taking such good care of us.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing with us! We'd love for this team's senior management to know about your good experience! Could you help us identify them by filling this out? http://bit.ly/1MtpDDS

name: Michael Mcgill
text: Service was great cooks need to step their game up!

name: Lanice Mossette
text: I really like the food there, and the waiters and witnesses are so kind and fun to talk to. The waffles are the best thing there. One thing I would work on is try to keep the flys out. Even with the flys Ill still eat there😂.

name: Dale Mayer
text:
Waffle House is, of course, a southern staple...but it makes it even better when you have a server that is amazing.

We were on the road from Arkansas to Georgia and stopped here with our 3 kids for dinner. Our server, Tabetha, was an absolute delight. She was basically running half the restaurant by her self, yet still found time to show each table the attention they deserved. She was very helpful, and even spared some time for a kind word...all while running at LEAST 9 tickets!

Thanks again for making our visit easy and keeping us entertained and well-fed!

name: kevin daboin
text: Great service and great food!

name: Jerry Mays
text: Good food and friendly service

name: Kevin Thompson
text: This location is one of the best.  It is the same food as all the others, it's a chain.  What makes it different is the staff.  Great staff, they don't make you feel like you are bothering them, or that attitude of I wish you were somewhere else, you know what I mean.  Many locals eat here regularly, including me, so it can get very busy.  So far I have not had one of those super long waits here, they are pretty quick.  Stop by and give 'em a try.

name: Nicholas Ogden
text: I love Waffle House!!

name: Itskaridione
text: Great experience. They were very busy. Even had people waiting to be seated. Yet it was clean, the food was perfect and the eait time on food despite the amount of customers was not long at all. Very pleased with this location!! Candy was a great server!!

name: Cyndi P
text: We had a short wait..but the Staff was on top of cleaning tables and seating us within 5 mins behind those leaving! Our Waitress, Ms Lisa, was awesome🙏 She was polite, cheerful and we always had hot coffee, creamer, jelly and refills on the kiddos drink...and all of this while having standing room only for those still coming in...OUR NEW FAVORITE PLACE...FOOD WAS DELICIOUS...TY!

name: Lillie Smith
text: Food was delicious! Got a happy HELLO when I walked in and the food was brought to me quickly. The waitress was careful to be sure I had everything I needed or wanted. WILL BE GOING BACK!

name: Madeline DaRhonda Jones-Clemons
text: Went to waffle house last night and was grossed out by the cook he had is pants below his waist and his shirt was stuck in the crack of his butt. Asked for well done hash browns and got hash browns that looked like a piece of brown construction paper. When I told another server about it she told him and he said he should have spit in our food. Very gross.

name: Christopher Deutschler
text:
Classic Waffle House experience. Staff is super friendly and efficient. Great customer experience.

10/10 would do it again. 👏

name: Deborah Holley
text: Good food, fast service

name: Elad Tewis
text: It was great place to stop and eat it look like the manager know what is doing everybody say Hi to each other everybody know each other

name: Rogelio Garcia jr
text: GREAT AS USUAL

name: Abigail Christie
text: I have not ever really liked going to Waffle House, however, the waitress we had was so nice and never went to long without asking if we needed anything.  She was friendly and helpful. Also, I was able to sit in comfort, I was not freezing while we ate.  Thank you Waffle House! Wish I could remember the waitresses name.  I will go back to this location.

name: Robert Daffron
text: Food was just right and service was good

name: Bonnie Oliver
text: Food was good and the staff was friendly and we went in at 1:00 a.m

name: Letha Cantrelle
text: This place is pitiful! My  husband  ordered a medium T-Bone steak and it was so overdone that it was close to cardboard! My nephew ordered a plain double-meat hamburger  with Bacon. Well the cook screwed up and put cheese on it and the waitress just told him to scrape the cheese off and I had to throw away the lertuce, tomato  and onions that was on it! I made them re-cook the burger and my child had to wait  for  almost 15 minutes  and watch us and his best friend eat while waiting! This is unacceptable.  My pork chops  were over-cooked as well! Best friend asked for a cheese burger with lettuce, tomato  and bacon and his burger had onions on it and had cubes of ham  on the side of his burger. Whatever that was for I don't know! Then charged me $40.81  for nearly the worst meal I have ever had at Waffle House!

name: Rogelio Garcia jr
text: GREAT AS USUAL

name: Adam Tindle
text: Love going to Waffle House!!! The people are very friendly and the service is fast and the food is great

name: Christopher Deutschler
text:
Classic Waffle House experience. Staff is super friendly and efficient. Great customer experience.

10/10 would do it again. 👏

name: Robert Conditt
text:
Good service. The waitress suggested a combination I would've never thought of. This one breakfast complete changed my view of the world. Suddenly, with one suggestion on how to add variety on my breakfast meal, I realized that the only limits to this world were the ones that I impose on myself; that my life is full of love and is fully open to me. I just have to put down false assumptions, pretenses, and prejudice. Walk into any situation with an open heart and mind.

Long wait deterred from overall experience.

name: W and D
text: We go to eat at least once a week. Service has always been great. We had a young man wait on us this evening, he was so polite and always made sure we had everything we need. Good food and good prices, and don't have to cook. What else can you ask for?

name: Markeese Cammon
text: Very friendly staff and very friendly people, great food, great waffles and great hash brown bowls so I have to give it 5 * butttttt it's not IHOP

You're welcome
