name: Kimberly Bass
text: Ordered my pizza online around 7:50 when my dominos app said it was ready I went up there, that was around 8:30. I went in expecting to be able to grab and go since it was already paid for online. Instead they gave me someone else's order, then had me wait and extra 15 minutes saying they were "working" on it. The whole time I'm standing there watching them prep other orders and not putting mine priority. They also use their bare hands no gloves and one of the guys had literally just touched the register. Just to be clear I am Local and this used to be my favorite place to order pizza from but when I got home and decided to eat it, it was half burnt and almost cold. The staff on the night of 06/10/21 just kept disappearing. Worst service I have ever had at this Foley location. Id hope management would do something about this. Just reading your reviews aren't the greatest! Thanks.

name: Curt Brewer
text: Oh my goodness, this was such a great surprise to find such incredible product out of a Domino's Pizza Store. I must say, this is the best teacher I've ever had for me Domino's Pizza. We ordered it on September 25th 2019. I guess they were busy because they didn't answer their phone, so my girl just ordered it off the website. Five stars!

name: Jenn Cook
text: We ordered a pizza at 7:40 and we had a wait time of 2 hours. Already ridiculous but ok we'll wait. 2 hours came and went. We tried to call the store and figure out where our delivery is, and they wouldn't answer the phone. We sat on hold for 20 minutes before just hanging up. Eventually we got a call from the delivery driver saying she is the only driver and they got back up. We asked for a refund for our order and got it, but we should have been notified a lot sooner by someone at the store so we could make a decision. On what to do. Bad customer service in my opinion.

name: Miles Mayforth
text: No longer accepts carryout dining or curbside pickup making it impossible to get the carryout deal aka the best and only thing you should buy here is gone. Zero stars. replace this dominos with a chipotle burrito place now that they will be out of business soon

name: B1ueWo1f_705
text: The service was good but I got home with my pizza and two of the prices look like someone had take a bite of the dough before they made the pizza.

name: Austin Rose
text: Called and was on hold for 20 minutes, finally decided to go up to the store where none of the employees were making an attempt to answer the phone and they said the online ordering was down. Not enough employees (none of the ones that work there care enough to do their job correctly), bathroom was in horrible condition, and they also got one of the pizzas wrong. You’d think if the owner saw all these 1 star reviews that something would change but I guess not. If you need me to teach you how to run a successful business contact me I’d be happy to help.

name: Brandon Kortum
text: This store is great! They are steady working every time I come in. I understand that every restaurant is short staffed so Instead of complaining about it, I am grateful for the ones who are here. If you don’t want to wait for a delivery, drive your lazy butt to the store and pick it up. Great pizza!

name: Lisa Lintz
text: The food and service was horrible. I waited an hour and a half after having a computer take my order to receive it. After the computer took my order I tried to call the store because it didn't give me the option of ordering garlic dipping sauce. I tried to call for almost an hour.... no answer. The one time it was answered I got hung up on. I mentioned this to the driver when he asked if I knew of anyone needing work... Told him they need a new manager. He said everyone takes it out on him. Told him to let me go get his tip because it's not his fault and he said don't worry about it... I have 12 more deliveries in my car and drove off.

name: jeff ryan
text: We order a pizza from here tonight I understand it a Friday night and spring break for some. so we expected it to be a little slow. Pizza arrived over a hour later and was cold not even a little warm driver forgot bread bowl. Driver said he would go get it and bring it back.well another 45 minutes later and crickets no call no show so we call and they hadn’t even made it or made a attempt to call or deliver. they want to credit it maybe we hungry the whole reason for ordering in the first place. once again I understand it’s Friday night.the girl that answered the phone was kinda rude customer service was not on the house tonight.

name: C Ada
text: I ordered my pizza by phone at the store the young man said my card wouldn't work (he tried 4 of my cards then said the computer was messed up)so hold for the manager, who never answered the phone. I tried calling back several times with no answer. And never received a pizza. Best thing to do GO TO CRACKER BARRELL!

name: christopher bella
text:
My wife and I have been ordering from this location for over four years. We both agree that the product coming out in the last few months has been the best ever. The other night I had to wait briefly for my order in their very nice store. I was able to watch at least ten people working in total concert at such a rapid pace. I was blown away. I also wanted to give special thanks to Sean over there. I have witnessed him working over there many times with only one or two coworkers. The guy knows his job and is always super polite and friendly. The service industry needs more people like him. Praise to the whole crew though. And thanks for GREAT food.
Sincerely,
Christopher Bella

resp.text: We are so glad you enjoyed your wings and pizza! Thank you for the 5-Star review and we can't wait to serve you again soon.

name: Christina Mason
text: Ordered a pan pizza and it was not a pan. It looked like a regular pizza in the pan box. It had a thick normal crust like a regular pizza. My pasta bowl was supposed to have only 3 ingredients plus the pasta and no meat. One of the ingredients was missing and there was chicken in it. No fork in the box either. Fortunately, I don’t live locally but if I did I would not be eating at this location for a long while. Also, when I called after placing my order I got hung up on 3 times before someone decided to take my call.

name: Steve Hall
text: I ordered a medium pepperoni pizza and salad. They didn't have the salad and the delivery driver said they tried to call me to tell me. The delivery driver said if I call the store I would get a refund on the salad but I got the automated answering service then I was put on hold for 10 minutes. I didn't want to wait for someone to take the call and hung up.  I'm giving one star cuz I wasn't satisfied.

name: Kaelin Creange
text: Just picked up two pizzas, one was thin crust, which we did not order (was supposed to be regular hand tossed), and the other had raw dough. We just tossed it in our own oven to try to salvage it and make it edible.  Unacceptable. And is Dominos just not doing the seasoning on the crust anymore? That is the only reason I would get Dominos, and neither of these had any at all. Completely bland crusts.

resp.text: Hi Kaelin, I sincerely apologize for this experience. We pride ourselves on making quality products for our customers and we want to work to remedy this situation. I am forwarding this information to our management team so that this can be addressed. Again, I apologize. We hope that you will give us another chance to serve you.

name: Jake Powis
text:
Hours say they're open til 12am for delivery, but its literally impossible to order because they refuse to pick up the phone and the website won't even let me place the order. Pathetic.

Edit: 5/6/21 Seriously, who owns this place? Are you actually letting the store be run like this? Employees constantly talking and ignoring customers, sloppily made pizzas, and CONSTANTLY closing early. Meanwhile Gulf Shores is killing it.

name: Melissa Feller
text: I usually order from Dominos in Foley once a week. Tonight I placed my order lady said it would be here in 30 minutes usually never have a problem so after 53 minutes I call back the lady said it on it's way out, 26 minutes later it arrives. I figured the driver would apologize for it taking an hour and 26 minutes to get here but no and we opened it up it was cold and undercooked. I will not be ordering from here ever again.

name: Erin Kanning
text: I placed a order over an hour and 30 minuets didn't receive it . Had to call to find out where it was and they said it was on it's way. Cancelled the order, I dont want to pay 40.00 for cold pizza. This is the 2nd time this has happened . They did not even try to do anything to make the process any better.

resp.text: Hi Erin, thank you for brining this to our attention. Could you please provide the date and time of your order? We would like to look into this further. I will be forwarding your review to our team so that we can address this. Thank you, and we hope to get the chance to serve you again.

name: deeLayne Smith
text: Everytime i try to call or online order between 10:30 and 12am during the week it always says its closed or no one answers the phone. And I've called other domynos and was told all dominos close at 12 am or later. But I've went to the restaurant and people are still there. And have let me order.

name: Lucas Phillips
text: Food was made quick and everything was fresh when I came to pick up my order

name: Natasha Byard
text: This Domino’s location has great employees that make using the app easy & accurately! Always very satisfied with our order!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 Star Review Natasha! We are glad that you like utilizing our app for easy ordering! We hope to serve you again soon!

name: Wrx Sti
text: Food was good they weren’t wearing gloves and didn’t come to the pick up window

name: Mike Burgess
text: i just picked up a pizza from  the dominos pizza on mckenzie strett in Foley AL.  Undoubtedly the worst pizza i have ever eaten (yes I ate it, I was hungry and didn't want to go back).  The pizza quite literally looked like it had either been dropped into the box sideways or was horribly made.  All of the toppings were pushed to one side of the pizza, with mush of it completely devoid of any toppings.  I paid for extra chees and IF there was cheese on this pizza, it was hardly evident.  this was not the first bad pizza i've had from this outlet, but it certainly is the last.  Imagine how bad something has to be to get a person to write an entire paragraph  of disgust.  It's Pizza, it's not that hard

resp.text: Hello Mike, I am very sorry for your experience with us. We strive to make quality products, and I apologize that we did not meet your standards during this order. We would love to make it right with you. I will be forwarding this information to our management team, and we hope that you give us another chance in the future to serve you.

name: Jonathan Thomas
text: Some of the best pizza ive ever had. Tasted like it was made by a pizza God. If I could give you more than 5 stars. I would.Thanks for the great dinner.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review! We appreciate your business and can't wait to serve you again soon!

name: Rachel lamar
text: I was a previous employee and know what my pizza should look like. Im disappointed in the lack of sauce toppings and cheese.

name: Marsha J.
text: The brownies were Awsome 💕 The sausage pizza was just over cooked a little in the middle. But it was still good. I will still go back for more orders🍕🍕🍕🍕

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review! I will share your feedback with our team. We can't wait to serve you again soon.

name: Chris Barnett
text: The service was very good and the employees were very polite and courteous. The food was very good as well.

resp.text: Thank you for your 5 Star Review and feedback! We love serving our customers, and hope we see you again soon!

name: Kathy Bischoff
text: Pizza was nice and hot and very good.

name: gary sullins
text: Very good and was ready on time

name: Donna Proctor
text: Not happy at all will never recommend this place ever again

name: Van Gardner
text: I wish I could post a negative star. The driver Alexander took 40 to get to my house, that is 7 minutes away at most. The salad was brown and slimy, pizza cold. Stephanie at the store wasn't listening to what I was trying to explain to her, and over talked me most of the time while rushing me off the phone. This is the worst place ever!!!! It made me put 1 star in order to post.

resp.text: I apologize you had this experience. I am taking this information directly to our District Manager and Store Manager of this location so we can look into this further.

name: David Vidal
text: Make order online , never got the food , call the restaurant more than 3 times until someone answered and they were no help , that was 1:30 minutes later

name: Dan Morrow
text: Have lived in Foley about 2 years now and have always ordered from dominoes . Each time I've ordered there has been a issue . I'm all for giving someone a second chance . Tonight's order the pizza was over cooked and burnt . The chicken alfredo in a dish had about 2 tablespoons of alfredo in it . The cheesy bread had about 2 sprinkles of bacon on it . There is always a issue with this food or delivery . The delivery doesn't take 2 hours when you live 2 miles from the store . Manager needs to get a handle on this busniess .

name: Melissa Conner
text: Every item I order from the menu always taste amazing. I haven't had any issues with my food and they always have it delivered to me quick! Each delivery driver that works at this location is always nice. Thanks guys for working through all of Covid-19!!!

name: Becki Kemp
text: Usually I'm happy with dominos pizza but last night I ordered the new cheeseburger pizza and it was the worst tasting pizza I've ever had, bland cold and just very bad. My daughter and I both threw it out. I called to tell my experience and was offered no apology just a sorry not sorry reply.  I won't be ordering from them zmfrom now on.

resp.text: I am sorry to hear about this experience! I will forward this information to the management team at this location. We hope you give us another chance soon.

name: Kathy Thacker
text: I had the sweetest and most polite delivery driver tonight.  Her name was Deatiny and I was so impressed with her.  Thank you, Dominoes Pizza and Destiny for caring about my late night order!!!  She was so wonderful!!!!

name: Morgan Langston
text: Destiny was my driver. She added herself a $10 tip on my card after I had already gave her a cash tip. Management refused to refund my money.

resp.text: Hello Morgan, thank you for bringing the situation to our attention. I will be forwarding this information to our management team so that we can address it.

name: Kathleen Dillard
text: Great customer service!!!!!! I was helping a friend move and decided pizza is the easiest. We order pizzas and a drink the realized we have no idea where cups are. Called the store and asked if they had cups and they brought us some...so nice. The food was hot and delicious. This store has great customer service.

name: Jade Brand
text: I like there pizzas there always delicious and everytime I order it's great they just need to have people at there window so it's faster that's all

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback! We will share your thoughts about the  window with our team so we can improve our pickup speeds for customers. We hope to serve you again soon!

name: Nicholas Deshazo
text: No problem from them sometimes the delivery times is a little long but as expected when there busy

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-Star review! We appreciate your understanding and feedback regarding delivery times. We can't wait to serve you again soon.

name: Pam Keller
text:
Ordered on the phone last night, took an hour but was warned. Ordered pepperoni, mushrooms on half and banana peppers.
It came without pepperoni. Too late to start again.

name: Zach Rutledge
text: I can't speak ill of any of the employees, but the pizza just isn't good. Not by chain standards and certainly not by the standards set by our locally owned pizza/Italian restaurants.

resp.text: Hello Zach, thank you for your feedback. I apologize for your experience and the quality not living up to the Domino's standard. I am going to be forwarding your review to our team so that these issues can be addressed. We hope that you will give us a chance to serve you in the future.

name: James Kretz
text: Awesome customer service.

name: Zach Calhoun
text: S/o Kenneth excellent customer service!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review and highlighting one of our team members! We hope you enjoyed your experience and that we serve you again soon!

name: leigh gaddy
text: Cheap pizza prices, pickup is quick but delivery is awful. Good tasting pizza tho!

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback! I will share this with our team to address the delivery issue. We hope to serve you again soon.

name: Twiz Country
text: My experience was amazing the Young Man  who answered my call was very upbeat and positive his name was David he also made my pizza and it was really good the store was clean and everyone was wearing their mask I will definitely be back thank you David

name: Ultra Supreme
text: Domino's Pizza is good they're consistent

name: Margie Hickman
text: Enjoyed a large supreme thin!!

name: CourtneyLynn Webster
text: Fast friendly and the pizza is always fresh

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 Star Review and your feedback! We are happy to serve you and hope that we can serve you again soon!

name: John Heilman
text: Food was hot, ready, and exactly as we ordered.

resp.text: Thank You for the 5 Star Review and feedback! We are glad that you enjoyed your experience, and hope that we see you again soon!

name: Kamari
text: I always order from here food is always hot and fresh.

resp.text: We are glad to have you as a repeat customer! We can't wait to see you again soon.

name: Jason Stewart
text: Supposed to be thin crust extra cheese. Not what I ordered

resp.text: Hello Jason, thank you for providing feedback. Could you provide more information about the time and date or your order? We would like to remedy the situation if possible!

name: stephanie lammert
text: The app sometimes works and sometimes takes 30mins. The pizza is great and good coupons. I would not recommend the wings they taste good but a very tiny for the price.

name: Anthony Hetzel
text: Pizza was good they charge tax

name: Katie Alexander
text: Gulf Shores location was out of product so we called here and big Ken delivered our pizza even though it was out of their delivery zone! It took no time! Great experience with this Domino’s location!

name: Dorothy Brown
text: Not impressed at all. The pizza tasted funky & was cut in large slices. I have had it with all 3 pizza restaurants in the area. I would rather buy a Marketside pizza from Walmart.

name: Brenda Blair
text: We purchased two medium, one chicken and one pineapple and Canadian ham. Both were delicious!!!

name: Dianna Jones
text: Fat service good food

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 Star Review Dianna! We are happy that you are pleased with our service! We hope to serve you again soon!

name: blurry
text: Not bad. The pizza is great, the service is better than what Alabama usually has, and the place is just really great in general. Definitely the place I would go to for a pizza night!

name: Schuyler Huff
text:
Dominos is falsely advertising car side delivery, window pick up and contactless delivery.

The pick up window was not working and I had to enter the store to get the pizza I paid for online.

This was highly unacceptable.

The manager provided no assistance.

name: Lonnie Tapp
text: Really good pizzas and people.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-Star review! I will pass your feedback along to our team. We can't wait to serve you again soon!

name: Richard Bowen
text: Something has changed here for sure..Awesome quality pizza..Delivered quickly, even though we ordered late! Thanks guys!

name: DeAnn Magon Kennedy
text: I ordered 1 mango habenero sauce and one blue cheese but I got 2 mango habenero. 🙁

name: Bob dole
text: Pizza was cooked on time, tasted great, pick up window person was kind and courteous.

name: Kimberly Lenard
text: I started using the app & got rewards quickly. Great quality & expedient!

name: Ella Hintersteiner
text: My orders were delivered on time, and the driver Emily was polite and professional.  Job well done!

name: Shannon O'Brien
text: I ordered my lizza and other stuff over three hours,ago online over three hours ago online and im still waiting for delivery to my house and im like within minutes from the store itself , I still.have yet to receive a call from the store manager. My boyfriend and I are super hungry and upset to say the least

name: Carolyn Lampton
text: Good pizza

name: Timothy McIntosh
text: Nice group of people that really care about what they do.

name: Salina Jenkins
text: I read mixed reviews on the sandwiches, but went for it anyway and I'm glad I did. We got the Philly cheese steak and the Italian and some plain wings. Everything was really good! The Philly could have used a little more onion and green peppers, but still very yummy!

name: Scott Funk
text: Everyone in this store is always so nice. Great quality and tasty! Go get one!

name: Big Boy Bender
text: Their food is amazing! Got it out as soon as possible and the wings were hot and fresh.

name: angela havranek
text: Normally I'd give a good review but this Is the second time I've had issues . The first issue they got back to me and gave me a credit of 30$ but when i went to order and my daughter went to go get it they told her there was no credit so in my eyes my issue was not solved so I will no longer be going here which is sad cause we ordered from here quite often

name: Kynsy
text: Well I had tried to pay for my order online and my card kept declining. I thought it was weird because I know I had enough money on the card and I thought it was their system bugging out or something. So I get to the store to pay for my pizza at the window and the employees kept saying my card has an invalid postal code! Funny thing is I used my card earlier at the dollar store without any trouble! The employees kept saying there is something wrong with my card! Total nonsense! Won't be going back for awhile...

name: Megan Wamble
text: I usually have no problems ordering through this store. But, the other day my pizza was wrong and my cinnamon sticks were cold, and had no icing. Very disappointed and the girl who delivered said I couldn’t get a refund and was really rude. I love this store but don’t appreciate my most recent experience

name: David Scott
text: I order delivery from here probably 5 times a week, because I love Domino's and because they are beyond hospitable. As a former Domino's employee, I absolutely respect and admire their work, day in and day out. Thanks folks!

name: Mariah Townsend
text: The Foley location always delivers fast and my orders are completely accurate! Cannot recommend highly enough.

name: Willyouum Be
text: Would have gave you 5 stars but I have had a few things wrong with a couple of orders. But I will order for you at least once a week. So thanks and keep up the good work.

name: Marvin R Elias
text: We got the order totally wrong and the drinks were tasteless

resp.text: I am sorry to hear about your experience. I will pass this information along to our management. We hope you give us another chance soon.

name: Purzen Beauty
text: Terrible  every time I order I have to remake and they do not use sauce instead they insist on over loading it with cheese. Go to little ceasar across the way. And they are dishonest I told have photos of burned pizza

name: Real Science
text: I order pizza about twice a week, and its fantastic

name: B J Elam
text:
Only thing was to much sauce for my taste. Next time I will order light sauce
Other wise very good.

name: Eric S
text: Had the nicest sweetest pizza lady for delivery tonight. It was her last stop and she brought everything we needed. The pizza was good too but the service and attention to detail from this lady made it even better. I think her name was Debbie. ThanK you Debbie from Dominoes, Foley

name: Matt Weaver
text: Bbq, bacon and cheese boneless chicken always seems to be a little well done

name: Samson Royals
text: Worse dominoes ever just moved to foley and everytime I order I have an issue. The last time I ordered they forgot one of my pizzas and the quality of the pizzas are poor always cold and not enough sauce!!!

name: jenny marie sunshine
text: I order from these guys a good bit. I have only ever had one issue where I was delivered the wrong order. The manager offered me a deal that was worth more than my original purchase, but I just wanted what I asked for. He hung up on me, but the delivery guy was a solid 10. (Same guy delivered both the wrong and right orders with a great attitude.)

name: Scott Paulins
text: Always deliver Licious Pizza what a friendly smile. Definitely my go-to pizza delivered. Keep up the good work keep bringing me some good pizzas!

name: wastedtime420
text: It's a nice restaurant the Brooklyn style pizza and hot wings are good.

name: Ron Quilhot
text: New thin crust terrific.  Great friendly staff.

name: Madison Webster
text: Ordered a pizza & a salad online. Get a callback 5 minutes later they are out of salads.  They will cancel my order & I can reorder with no salad.  But, the first charge will be on my card for 2-3 days.  Just canceled my order. Papa johns from now on I guess.

name: Loretta Agnello
text: Love the chicken wings if done extra crispy which they do ty.

name: Connie Mandac
text: Domino's sandwiches are soooo yummy! Not the first place you might think to get a sandwich from, but they really are delicious!

name: Beach Life Gulf Shores,AL
text: Always great pizza and fast service.

name: Sheila McClain
text: Always delivered hot and very timely. Order frequently and have only had 1minor issue. Before I even finished the review on their website, a manager was calling me to see what the issue was. He was very polite and handled the situation professionally. Domions in Foley is great.

name: Carl Edwards
text: Excellent quality pizzas and punctual. This location is the best !

name: David Emond
text: I have ordered carry-out from this location many times. The pizza is good and they always get our order right and have it ready one time.

name: ronald browning
text: Up to an hour and 60

name: Tanya Hayes
text: Ordered online. received text and watched the tracker. It all looked and tasted awesome. I will return to this location. Employee at drive through was very polite.

name: Karla Thornton
text: Great pizza, prices and quick too.  The pick up prices are awesome.

name: A L
text: Almost always have a very long wait for orders to be delivered even though I live a few minutes away from the store, pizza arrives cold and tastes soiled from sitting out too long. Delivery driver was rude too, had the same older guy twice and he never talks to you, whenever I say hi or Thankyou, he never responds, won’t even make eye contact and just hands me the receipt to sign all without saying a word. I Said Thankyou again as he was leaving he laughed and still ignored me. I tipped on my online order, wish I never had, very rude delivery driver did not deserve a penny.

name: Morgan NyBlom
text: Service is usually smooth and food is pretty good for the price! Tonight was great- had a long day at work and decided dinner wasn't worth cooking. Ordered a medium pizza and a pasta at around 12:35AM and had hot food at the door by 1AM (When they closed). Matt, the delivery dude, called ahead to make sure he came to the right address and was very polite and approachable at the door. Despite being the end of the night he presented everything perfectly and was very humble and polite when I handed him his tip. Hope to continue to have great service with future orders!

name: Wendy Thomas
text: Food was not fresh at all

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your feedback. We hope that we get the chance to serve you again, and meet your expectations!

name: Michelle Eubanks
text: Every time I try to order off the app it never works and when let the manger know about it they just tell me that it's a corporate app and they have nothing to do with it

name: Local Business
text: I haven't ordered a pizza in years. Not bad. Fast service. Fresh hot with good toppings. Double cheese pepperoni and hot peppers. Surprisingly tasty. Sunday afternoon at 3 pm

name: Michael Nier
text: Always takes the Gluten Free precautions for our orders. Fast friendly service employees. We have been Domino customers for over 26 years. We have gotten some bad pizzas...but they Always fix and reward us for our patience. I have ordered other local Gluten free Pizzas and I will say they were awful!!

name: Adam Foley
text: Almost always has good servics but 100% the best breadsticks/pizza at a great price

name: Elizabeth Teresa Castellanos
text: Order was ready for pick, was accurate and was on time

name: Fred Meyer
text: Strike three - I’m done here. I used the app to order a large two item pizza with a little extra sauce and it cost me  $13.00.   On the way out the driveway of the shop I see a sign “large 2 item pizza $7.99 all day every day”. No one said anything about that when I picked it up, so basically  I paid 5 dollars for a tablespoon of extra sauce.  Thanks for nothing.

name: Sabrina Swinney
text: The pizza & service is normally pretty good. Well I pulled up all 3 workers were gathered around so I started thinking what if something was wrong with my pizzas or what were they doing. I get home eat a piece I thought to myself "this pizza has a funny taste" I finish eating it anyways. The kids come bring me their pizza an say the same thing. I hope we don't get sick from it.

name: Jennifer Edwards
text: Not bad but it can get expensive

name: Ashley Doan
text: Ordered on line delivery at 615pm got pizza at 820pm.  Pizza was soggy from being in delivery vehicle so long.  Must be poor management and ownership because employees were nice and apologetic.

name: Will Kinder
text: The quality of the pizza has definitely changed in th last 10 years. I find myself ordering more and more from this place. Pizza always fresh and made right every time.  Delivery drivers are always nice, too.

name: Bob Guerey
text: was nice place to eat quick lunch

name: Monah Carlisle
text: Love our Dominos.  They are always so nice and pleasing. And my orders are always on time. Great job!  Thanks for your hard work!

name: ZM Jones
text: Can't believe how fast Tammie brought me my food. I love you guys. Keep up the great work.

name: Erik Johnson
text: Really upset- According to the pizza tracker, our order was sitting waiting for delivery for almost 20 minutes. While the driver was punctual and polite, our Philly pizza was so soggy that the box was starting to fall apart. There was almost no bacon or onions on our small pizza, and our 'stuffed' cheese bread had cheese on top, and no 'stuffing' at all. I order from Domino's because they've been great in the past,  but I will be looking into other places. Really dissapointed.

name: Brian Qualls
text:
My primary pizza source for the last four years.  In that span, I've only ever had one issue, which they quickly rectified.

Friendly drivers, great management, and delicious pizza (and more!)

Give their pasta and chicken a try, too.  Those Choco lava cakes are insane!

Thanks!

name: Dhanraj Patel
text: We visited this place on 03/08/2019 around at 10:10pm and we ordered 2 large pizza with all veggie toppings and when order came out in one of pizza there was 5 to 7 pieces of meat and we don’t eat meat ..well that can happen we understand but when I told them to change it they said they can’t guarantee that it won’t be any meat pieces in new ones too cuz their toppings get mixed up while they put it..I did not expect this from dominos..but what if some one strictly vegetarian ..and that’s their fault that topping get mixed up ..why they explain customers that toppings can get mixed up while they in rush...and not friendly staff at all..SO BAD...

name: David Goldstein
text: Outstanding! 6:00pm on a Saturday used my mobile app and the order was perfect!! Pickup window was staffed by a very friendly and polite young lady. My order was ready, hot and Delicious!!

name: Billy Colburn
text: Love this Domino's -  Always great to deal with them!  Best pizza hands down.

name: Tim Tasker
text: I order here all the time!  Use the app!  They do a great job!   Getting a free pizza tonight just for using the app.  Quality pizza.  They have provolone!  Awesome job!

name: Taylor Reisen
text: Literally took an hour to get my food. I live 12 min away and my food was barely even warm.

name: Cynthia Gillespie
text: Ordered online while in Foley,AL on a weekend getaway. Changed my address to the hotel address and even set it as the default address for good measure. I get a phone call saying they are there to deliver the pizza and i told him my room number and he tells me he's at my home address. I explained what happened and he tokd me to call the Foley store direct so i did. I made contact with a female at the Foley store that completely blew my issue off and she told me it wpuld be a 2 hour wait even after it's already been o er an hour by this time.  I asked her if i could speak to a manager about the internet complaint and she told me she was the manager and she couldn't help me. I asked for a corporate number and she told me she didn't know it but i could look it up online. She was DEFINITELY NOT CUSTOMER SERVICE MATERIAL! To say the least we ordered from another Pizza place and waited for our money to be refunded by Dominoes to our debit card.

name: Casey Dooley
text: Foley Domino's Pizza in the BEST

name: Trinity Shelby
text: Always great service and pizza!

name: Thomas T
text: Was not the best pizza I ever had and for a first time being there I wouldn't go back didnt taste good like the pizza back in illinois

name: Tony Henley
text: Very disappointed in the price to begin with.  $44 for 3 medium pizzas. Further disappointment in the quality of the pizzas ordered. Not one to ever talk negatively but I will not do business with any dominos again. The driver was cordial and professional, at least

name: Gary Stepanian
text:
Pizza was 50% off by purchasing online, and was easy as "pizza pie".  Everything was delivered as ordered, Food was good and fresh and tasty.

The delivery man was pleasant, efficient, and really trying to please.

We always buy Domino's Pizza, they made a comeback and we love it.

name: 6th Ave Bonnie
text: I ordered my pizza at 7:30 they didnt show up to deliver until 10 thats entirely to long of a wait for  pizza and bread sticks never again will i be returning

name: Beth S
text: We ordered and were delivered on time two great pizzas!  The only thing missing was the three cups of dipping sauce we ordered!  Everything was great but we really missed the dipping cups!

name: Anthony Chaney
text: Great pizza. The land lord needs to fix the parking lot though. Watch out for the pot holes.

name: B C
text: Pan pizza the best

name: Rodney Woodard
text: Way too much sauce on the pizza.

name: Crystal Jones
text: I love the online ordering set up. Dominos even have a system to text you when food is ready.

name: Nessa Patriot
text: I only do delivery, and theres this lady that works there who makes the BEST Pizza's you'll ever taste. Very polite staff and always make sure you have everything before leaving. 10/10

name: sam ringo
text: Absolutely horrible service.  It took over an hour to get the food delivered to the Hotel I was staying at (less than 5 miles in distance).  They didn't deliver the sauce that I ordered and paid for.  It took over another hour to get this delivered to the hotel.  if you're hungry, you had better go somewhere to eat!

name: James Lick
text: They showed me Detroit love,!!!😊

name: Janet Saxon
text: Love it

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 Star Review! We hope to serve you again soon!

name: James Franks
text: I swear everytime i order pizza from you guys i PAY for ranch and recieve it like 20 percent of the time. I know it doesnt seem like a big deal but thats what i like. If ur gonna charge me almost 2 bucks for 2 of them id like to get them idk silly me. Of course i didnt get them again just now. Even ordered online and it shows plain as day. And u guys never do anything about it. What am i gonna ask for, the driver to drive all the way there and back just to give me ranch? No thats crazy and its not their fault. Last time yall said i could drive and come get some. Im not doing that either, i can go get a whole bottle for the price of 2 little sufflè cups from yall. But i dont mind paying it for the convience except i almost never get what i pay for. I never take it out on the drivers and dont even complain cause its not their fault and i understand its just ranch. Its just getting old. I pay 21 something for one pizza and 2 ranches just for me, i give the driver 30 bucks and let them keep the change cause im in the server industry. How hard is it to ask for a little bit of ranch (that i PAY for) i mean come on. I hate leaving reviews like this but i swear ive proly paid 50 bucks just in ranch that i havent gotton. I could buy quite a few pepperoni pizzas with just ranch money think about it

text:
Cons: Skimpy on meat toppings is an understatement...not even 1 tiny piece of sausage per slice. The pizza was $22 and a $3 delivery charge?? the delivery driver doesn’t get the delivery fee even though they use their own vehicle...
I use to like dominos but they keep delivering less and charging more.
Pro’s: The positive side was the driver was punctual and it didn’t take long for delivery... make Sure to tip your driver because dominos certainly pockets the delivery fee!
Think I’ll go out for steak next time at that price ($30).

In the passt it had always been super cheesy and hot  dripping  with cheese but tthis bread while warm barely had any cheese toasted INTO the bread. Very cheaply made and did not taste like cheese at all. HORRIBLE!! If you can't do it properly anymore QUIT MAKING IT.   The pizzas were satisfactory but quality appears to be slipping considerably.

name: Michele Tolliver
text: The first order was delivered an 1/2 hr after it left the store.  Te driver didn't bring the drink and the pizza box wasn't warm to the touch and felt light.  I looked inside it, the pizza was there and when I tasted it, it was barely lukewarm, like it had been sitting out for an hour or so.  The driver promised to return with the drink; he was polite and genuinely annoyed at the missing drink.  I called the store and talked with Roy, told him about the order's condition.  He stated ti just came out of the oven but I found that hard to believe. He said he would make a new pizza and send it out with the driver.  40 minutes later the new pizza came.  The drink was there and it wa cold. :)  The pizza box was warmer to the touch.  I sent the first pizza back with the driver even though I'd only eaten 4 slices from it; it was the thin and crispy square cut.  The pizza was a little hotter and juicier than the first pizza, but not the "cheese stretching" or "have to blow it off a lil" kinda of hot like I would have gotten with the other dominos i order from or pizza hot.

text: The delivery guy forgot the $2 20oz Dr. Pepper I ordered. He offered to drive back to the store and get it but his voice said he really didn't want to and I didn't want to waste gas so I told him not to. I had already said how much change I wanted back but I wish I had waited until I found out he had forgotten my drink, wouldn't have given him a $4 tip had I known he forgot the drink. Also the chicken alfredo's pasta was too al dente, ended up being chewy and my fiance barely wanted to eat it after working 12 hours. Both pastas were luke warm and were straight up cold by the time we got half way through eating. Chicken bites were so tiny it was more like crumbs, won't be getting those ever again, definitely not worth $6. Was not happy with this experience, and I'm probably not going to get delivery from this location again.

text: I come to this location often, and I always order the same thing. This time however my smoothie tasted like watered down powder. I called the store and tried to explain that I always get the same thing and this one wasn’t right to which the girl replied “I made it myself that’s how it’s supposed to taste but I’ll remake it”. Look if you’re telling me it’s how it’s supposed to taste, I really don’t want you to make me another one. I hate that I had to throw it down the drain because they are on the expensive side. At least we are getting a soul bowl here soon.

text: I’ve been with this store since day one. Me and my coworkers love working here. The owner, Starr is so passionate about this business and she treats our customers and her staff like family. I’m so happy to be a part of such a great team and serving such a great city some awesome smoothies!

text: Such an amazing staff. The quality of everything is A1 (which means it's top notch, if some of you didn't know). Smoothie King is an all time favorite and I'm happy to have one in my town!

text: I normal don’t write reviews but since I moved down here from California and they just opened a smoothie king.. I decided I needed to share a great experience. On my way to work I was stuck in traffic and decided I wanted something cold and healthy. I stop  by smoothie king and ordered the Mango Fest.. 10/10 would recommend this to everyone,  it was SO good.. but besides how good my smoothie was, the staff was super friendly and super fast as well. They were pretty busy that day but everyone still had smiles on their faces and greeted everyone who walked through the door. This smoothie king is a wonderful place, and this is the only place I’ll go for my smoothies!!

After that experience I guess I'll just have to buy a blender and make my own smoothies cause I'm not about to waste my time like that ever again. Oh, of course all the kids working there were more worried about gossip than making my smoothie from what I noticed. Lots of ppl back there talking but not about work.

text: The food was good fast and service was friendly.. Ann Marie  is one of best waitress  I have encountered  in years. Her smile makes you feel welcome and her attitude is the best.. She makes you feel at home here and for a Trucker that means allot.. Keep up the good work...

name: Tim Darnall
text: Terrible experience after waiting 45 mins for food. They had all our orders mixed up. They were out of French fries. My Turkey sandwich smelled like fish. Will never return. Needs shut down or I highly recommend better managing.

name: Ann Hampton
text: If you are African American please do not stop by here. My husband and I was never properly greeted. Our food was half  cooked. Our waitress Amanda completely ignore us. The grits were thick, and disgusting. I also went online submitted the promo code for the survey  and complained. I submitted a complain on Google,  yellow pages app, and Facebook under the Huddle house and Lincoln, Alabama. Someone from huddle house will be calling soon and I will complain again. If you are black please RUN. I was hungry when I arrived and I was starving when I left.

name: Angela Downey
text:
The waitress was nice. The coffee was good.
Other than that it was a terrible experience.  All of the food was cold except the waffle but probably because we had them remade because they weren't dark enough.
I had to send back the eggs because they were over easy instead of over medium. The remake still wasnt cooked enough. The butter on the toast didn't melt because it was so cold. You'll be wasting your hard earned money eating here.

name: Lake Kraken
text: Hair in my food. Bugs on the window sill. Ordered onion rings and my brother got them with his order and I got tater tots. They didn't have fries. Also mixed our orders up. Never coming here again. Around 12 o clock.

name: daniel larson
text: Although some of the staff was friendly, they tried to make me pay for food I did not order.   I left and left the food. I've been in this store a few times and its always hit or miss.  Mostly miss. This was the last time I will visit. Instead, go to the 24 hour diner next door. A little more price wise and takes a little longer for them to cook your food, but the food is better and always nicer staff.

name: Haleigh Hayes
text: Great cooks and good food. You can tell that the staff here needs better leadership. Everything was great but it seems like a couple of waitresses didn't know the menu.

name: Ronda McBride
text: We've been coming to this Huddle House every summer for 19 years...and have always loved it. But today was a very different experience.  They seemed to be short-staffed...at least I hope that's all it was because the service was bad and the food was even worse.   (And the men's restroom was a health hazard.)  I'm not sure if we'll be back.

name: Brandi Thompson
text: This store is amazing the best management and team I've seen in years I love the atmosphere and food price great service great team well trained and truck parking you cant ask for more

name: Joshua T
text: Don't do it!!! the customer service is non existent and the food was nasty. The staff was incompetent and rude.

name: Mark Garcia
text: Biscuits so hard my fork broke. No seasoning on the food. Sausage gravy does not have sausage in it. Too expensive!!!!!! Paying for garbage is dumb, don't do it. I've been to this same location twice now. The burger was not edible then either. Close it down!!!!

name: Krazy Place
text: Fast food but dine in. Tons of drama, and staff spends most their time in the back. Watched cook take food to table with gloves on then go back and start cutting items. Heard they ran out of product. Disappointing!

text: I'd give it zero if I  could. $14.65 for a waffle bacon, eggs w/cheese, coffee! waffle was a waffle pancake, ONE egg. if your reading this and you eat here,good luck..

1st the SERVICE was 100%

We were traveling thru from Memphis going to Atlanta and having fun with the Cook and the Waitress...It was So Nice just being able to JOKE Around  and  enjoy each others Company!
Way2Go Huddle House Staff Keep Up the Good Work.😁😁😁

text:
Drugged out waitress didn't greet me, ignored me for about 8 minutes (I was the only one there at the time.) Rudely took my order. Kept stepping outside waiting for a certain car to pull up.

Edit: I left without eating. Noticed the cook was mopping the floor and handling my food without washing his hands. Witnessed two other people walk out.

text: Two weeks in a row, on different  nights, we have tried eating here after work. Both times we sat for 10 minutes without being acknowledged before we left. This used to be a good place to eat, not fast by any means, but good. They need more workers, or better workers, or something. The waitress behind the counter was crying, literally tears rolling down hear cheeks, crying to a customer about how every other phone call was an order. Really!? It's  a restaurant, you should expect orders coming in.

name: Mickey Berry
text: I’m normally not a Subway fan. Well, I don’t mean that I’m not a subway fan, but what I mean is, it’s not top of mind when I’m thinking of a restaurant or somewhere quick to eat.  Every time I’m at this location though, I always enjoy the food and the customer service is always great. Antonio greeted us and took care of us and made us feel at home. I got the steak and cheese sub, chips, and a drink, and my wife got sliders. The bread was not fantastic on the sliders but overall it was a great experience for fast food. This location is super convenient to my office and our house. I’ll be back!
